markdownRemark.html:
“Mendicants, the Yamunā river slants, slopes, and inclines to the ocean. …”

“… the Aciravatī river …”

“… the Sarabhū river …”

“… the Mahī river …”

“… all the great rivers …”

SN.45.104–108. Dutiyādipācīnaninnasuttapañcaka (“Five Discourses on Sloping to the East”)
